snippet: The Rocky Mountain Land Library, a sprawling research institution situated on a ranch at 10,000 feet above sea level, is the work of two booksellers.
abstract: Devoted book sellers Jeff Lee and Ann Martin are creating sprawling research institution, called Rocky Mountain Land Library in South Park, Colo, that will offer academics, birders, hikers and others chance to savor literature and the West.
lead_paragraph: The Rocky Mountain Land Library, a sprawling research institution situated on a ranch at 10,000 feet above sea level, is the work of two booksellers.

headline.main: Envisioning a Colorado Haven for Readers, Nestled Amid Mountains of Books
headline.print_headline: A Haven for Readers Nestled Amid Mountains of Books

keywords.value: Tattered Cover Book Store (Denver, Colo, Retailer)
